column4: You diagram looks like one PC connected to another rather than both connected to a hub.
Did you set the static IP in the same way on both PCs?  Can one ping the other?
I would be suspicious that the hub is really more complicated and preventing access to the 208.71.147.195 address.  Are you sure you have a simple hub there?

Can you configure the first system as 208.71.147.195 and the non-working system as 208.71.147.194 and see that which works through the hub?  That would confirm that the problem is with an address or with one system's configuration.
